version_description:
For any questions concerning this app or update, please call 315-701-1372 or email support@emergencysmc.com, as we do not monitor app reviews for technical support needs or comments.

This app update includes a new style of incident alert notifications for departments that receive dispatches via IaR, so that members can indicate their response status without opening the app. Be sure that you select to receive your IaR dispatch notifications in the "Alert" style (under Notifications in your device's General Settings), and that you have selected a default app response in your online member profile. The options differ in lock screen mode (left and right swipe options) and unlocked mode (button options within the alert).

This update also includes a new distance measuring tool on the mapping pages (handy for knowing how far the closest hydrant is, measuring building size, and search operations). Click on the ruler icon, and then tap the start and end points of what you want to measure. Change from feet/meters/miles by tapping the Gear icon on the mapping pages.

Also included in this update: text to voice options for dispatch notifications within the incident details and mapping pages, direct tech support options from the app, general networking and system improvements and app interface improvements.

Please call or email the office for a tutorial on new features, and for any questions/issues. 315-701-1372 or support@emergencysmc.com. We do not monitor app reviews for technical support needs or comments.

Included: Live member tracking when responding from within the apps (must first be turned on by your department in "System Settings" online); Do Not Disturb functions; messaging templates; scheduled messages (permission needed); revised settings access; general system enhancements.​ Please call or email the office for explanations, details and limitations on these new features.

Please call or email the office for a tutorial on new features, and for any questions/issues. 877-509-0381 or support@emergencysmc.com. We do not monitor app reviews for technical support needs or comments.

Included: Improved password recovery tools, additional tracking options, and general system improvements.

Please call or email with questions/issues or for a tutorial on new features. 877-509-0381 or support@emergencysmc.com. We do not monitor app reviews for technical support needs or comments.


This update includes: A new fire line map marker, login and access improvements, preplan improvements, and general system enhancements.

Please call or email with questions/issues or for a tutorial on new features. 877-509-0381 or support@emergencysmc.com. We do not monitor app reviews for technical support needs or comments.



This update includes: The ability to receive non-dispatch messages from dispatchers via push notification, the ability to change the appearance of the icon used for live member location tracking, the addition of a USNG overlay option, fix of an iPad display issue for lists, and general system enhancements.

Please call or email with questions/issues or for a tutorial on new features. 877-509-0381 or support@emergencysmc.com. We do not monitor app reviews for technical support needs or comments.


This update includes: security updates, and general system enhancements. Updating is necessary to maintain full functionality of the app.

Please call or email with questions/issues or for a tutorial on new features. 877-509-0381 or support@emergencysmc.com. We do not monitor app reviews for technical support needs or comments.

This update includes: the availability of members' emergency contact information to administrators via the apps; an address verification tool (permission required) that allows users to verify the location of an incident on the maps, and to have the verified location map for all other users; and general system enhancements.

Please call or email with questions/issues or for a tutorial on new features. 877-509-0381 or support@emergencysmc.com. We do not monitor app reviews for technical support needs or comments.

This update includes: a new search bar for emergency contacts and for when sending messages; the ability to see upcoming events beyond 45 days; and general system enhancements.

This update includes: revised button options on the app's mapping pages to allow for less clutter (tap the map to hide buttons, tap to unhide them); new option to only display hydrants within "X" feet of the incident location; additional Do Not Disturb option for priority text messaging address; links to training webinars under "IaR Links" tab; and general system enhancements.

This update includes: screen modifications for iPhone X compatibility; minor bug fixes for clearing responders from iPads and searching old incidents; modifications to the stored and custom ringtones; and general system enhancements.

Please call or email with questions/issues or for a tutorial on new features. 877-509-0381 or support@emergencysmc.com. We do not monitor app reviews for technical support needs or comments.

This update includes: a new RSVP feature for calendar events from email notices, the PC screen and apps, with a list showing who is or is not attending each event; the ability for departments to add custom url links into their system and apps for easy access to non-IAR resources; and general system enhancements.

Please call or email with questions/issues or for a tutorial on new features. 877-509-0381 or support@emergencysmc.com. We do not monitor app reviews for technical support needs or comments.

This update includes: The ability to geofence buildings and regions, and to tag pre-plans and regional response plans to any incident that is located within a geofenced area; customizable emergency contact fields (for blood type, medical conditions, etc); new navigation options within IaR mapping, including Apple Maps and Waze; "Heart Healthy" ring tone options; an integration with FirefighterCloseCalls.com to display Secret List emails within IaR; and general system enhancements.
